name: Standoff Multiplayer
description:
The incredible online Standoff of two teams in multiplayer sessional shooter. Are you storm trooper, sniper or do you prefer stealth operations? Choose your role and weapons in multiple game modes like Team Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Arms Race or Sniper Duel and show your supremacy. Overwhelming action, multiplayer and ranking system wouldn't let you relax.
Play with your friends over the network or online with thousands of players from all over the world!
We are in VK: http://vk.com/game_standoff
We are in Twitter: https://twitter.com/so_multiplayer
